meanings.sent1: My goddaughters are like family to me.
meanings.sent2: She has three goddaughters whom she loves dearly.
meanings.sent3: The goddaughters giggled as they played dress-up together.
meanings.sent4: Her goddaughters' laughter filled the room with joy.
meanings.sent5: The bond between goddaughters and their godparents is special.

meanings.sent1: We invited all the goddaughters to the birthday party.
meanings.sent2: The goddaughters brought flowers to thank their godparents.
meanings.sent3: The group of goddaughters looked like a colorful bouquet.
meanings.sent4: The room echoed with the chatter of the goddaughters.
meanings.sent5: The goddaughters' presence added warmth to the gathering.
